Name: Final Fantasy Dissidia Opera Omnia Portraits
Author: MtfujiInMyPants
Description:
This mod replaces the large Amano portraits which don't match the sprites with the DFFOO versions which fit within the text box and match the ingame sprites. 

Most of these came straight from the game (PCs except for Galuf's costume, Choco, Exdeath & Greg). 

The others are heavily modified by me. Hopefully I did them justice. 

They look pretty good ingame. 

Just finished these and tested most of them. Consider this a beta release.
